en:
四面八方
(Sìmiànbāfāng)

in all directions

Definitions of 四面八方
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

adverb
    in all directions
        四面八方
    far and near
        四面八方

adjective
    all-around
        全面, 全能, 四面八方, 四周, 通盘, 团团
ja:
